transcript:
Customer: Camp chali ja rahi hai to dekho pehle baat to karo.
Hai.
Executive: Hi, good morning Neha ma'am.
Customer: Good morning sir.
Executive: Shubham baat kar raha hu ma'am senior manager IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji bataiye sir.
Executive: Sir ma'am aapka call aaya tha, ma'am last time meri aapse baat to hui thi, maine to saari cheeze bola tha na ki aapko ki mere ko thoda sa time do maine wo saari cheeze filter out and saara wo karaya tha aapka.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir.
Customer: Mujhe chat matlab aapne parso karaya tha maine kal tak wait kiya aaj bhi koi inquiry nahi aayi.
Executive: Ma'am kal, kal chutti thi na ma'am, kal chutti thi.
Customer: Kal chutti thi aapko.
Executive: Kal, haan kal Guru Nanak Jayanti thi na, kal chutti thi us cheez ki.
Executive: Matlab sab gazetted holiday tha, holiday tha to sab bank saari matlab sabhi band tha.
Executive: To matlab ye matlab aise nahi ki main aaj karunga to wo matlab ek din ka process nahi hai, matlab it takes seven days matlab wo rate pe jaise aapka beech mein chhut gaya tha us wajah se wo kam ho gaya. Aap ek hafta regular isko use karenge jaise properly to wo aapka flow ban jayega aur wapas aapko proper leads jo aa rahi thi wo aana shuru ho jayegi ma'am. Aisa nahi hota ki leads mein koi dikkat aayegi.
Executive: Jo proper flow ban raha tha us hisab se aapko aana shuru ho jayenge regular basis pe rahegi wo. Aapko bas process follow karna hai jo aapke kaam ki consume kariye jo nahi hai usko not rate karke hatate rahiye bas.
Customer: Sir hum us pe kaam karte hai aisa nahi hai ki hum jo inquiry aati hai us pe kaam nahi karte hai. To chhoda to humne kuch bhi nahi hai. Humko review mein se nahi lagta kisi se contact karna us pe humne baat hi nahi ki hai. Jo hamara hai nahi.
Executive: Ma'am, ma'am, ma'am. Ma'am wahi to bol raha hu ma'am.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ki sometimes, sometimes kya hota hai ki kisi time jaise kisi time inquiry nahi generate by lead post ki nahi kari matlab kuch reason ki wajah se koi direct inquiry mein call kare to us time pe by lead ka flow kam jyada upar niche chalta rehta hai ma'am. Ye matlab flow aapka dynamic rahega matlab change hota rahega aisa nahi ki hamesha constant rahega. Ab suppose kisi ne inquiry nahi kari by lead nahi dali to hum to fake inquiry generate nahi karte taki hum kahin se aisa nahi karte. Hum jo dalta hai us hisab se bhi use karte hai. To wo kam jyada chalta rahega abhi abhi aapko low dikh raha hai to ek dum se char panch din ke baad aapko boom dikhega badhta badh jayega ek dum se.
Executive: To wo chalta rehta hai ye jo saara dynamic hai.
Customer: Sir bhaiya.
Executive: Aur ye chalta rahega matlab aise hi.
Customer: Kya cheez?
Customer: Inquiry kab se aana shuru hogi?
Executive: Inquiry aa to gayi hai abhi dekho abhi aapko dikh nahi rahi hai mere ko dikh rahi hai.
Executive: Paanch inquiry dikh rahi hai mere ko aapke portal pe. Kaunsi.
Customer: To mujhe to ek dikh rahi hai.
Executive: Kaunsi dikh rahi hai aapne all India recommended ki jagah recommended.
Executive: Recommended ki jagah all India pe kariye pehle please ek baar.
Customer: Recommended ki jagah India pe kariye.
Customer: Sir ye aap agar is pe call back karungi to aap hi se contact ho.
Executive: Haan aa jayega aisa karte hai hum video call pe aa jate hai waha par main aapko screen dikha kar aap bhi apna screen mein ye saari cheeze clear kar dete hai ki kaise aapko aayegi.
Customer: Sir.
Executive: Haan ma'am.
Customer: 1 baje.
Customer: Sir 1 baje aapko video call meeting kariye.
Executive: Haan 1 baje haan 1 baje video call pe aa jate hai, theek hai. Theek hai. Us pe kar lete hai main aapko apne personal number se bhi hi dal deta hu us pe hai na. Apna office wala number de deta hu, theek hai. Haan haan.
Executive: Okay then.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states no inquiries received.

Resolution:

- Executive explained about gazetted holiday.

- Executive explained about dynamic flow of buyleads.

- Executive offered a video call to resolve issue.



Next Steps: 

- Video call scheduled for 1 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiry, video call, holiday

seller_categories.mcat_name: Dr Morepen Blood Glucose Test Strips
